Cutting Parameters Module

class csp.CuttingParameters.CuttingParameters(stock_length, blade_width, dead_zone, cut_lengths, cut_quantities)

A class used to represent and interact with the cutting parameters for the stick packing problem.

Variables:

  • stock_length (int or float) – The length of the stock material.

  • blade_width (int or float) – The width of the blade.

  • dead_zone (int or float) – The dead zone of the blade.

  • cut_lengths (list) – The lengths of the cuts.

  • cut_quantities (list) – The quantities of the cuts.

  • scale_factor (int) – Scale factor used to convert data to decimal integer.

  • jobNumber (int) – The job number.

  • dirPath (str) – The directory path.

  • solver (str) – The solver type.

  • author (str) – The author of the solution.

  • debug (bool) – The debug status.

  • solution (list of list of int or float) – The solution to the stick packing problem.

buildSolution()

Builds the solution for cutting parameters object.

Raises:

ValueError – If invalid numeric values are entered.

buildXls()

Builds the XLS files using the provided solution, blade width, job number, and directory path.

getAuthor()

Get the author of the cuttingParameters object.

Returns:

Author Name

Return type:

string

getDebug()

Get the Debug status of the cuttingParameters object.

Returns:

Debug Status

Return type:

bool

getDirPath()

Get the directory path for the cuttingParameters object.

Returns:

Directory Path

Return type:

String

getJobNumber()

Get the job number for the cuttingParameters object.

Return int jobNumber:

Job Number

getSolution()

Get the solution of the CuttingParameters object.

Returns:

Solution

Return type:

List of lists of floats

getSolver()

Get the solver type for the cuttingParameters object.

Returns:

Solver Type

Return type:

string

print_solution()

Prints the solution of the stick packing problem.

Example Output:

  • Stick 1: [1, 0, 1, 0, 1], Usage: 60.00%

  • Blade Width: 10, Dead Zone: 2

setAuthor(author)

Sets the author for the cuttingParameters object.

Parameters:

author (string) – Author Name

Set the debug status of the cuttingParameters object.

Parameters:

debug (bool) – Debug Status

Sets the directory path for the cuttingParameters object.

Parameters:

dirPath (string) – Directory Path

Set the job number for the cuttingParameters object.

Parameters:
